summary: This is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding weekly updates. The key content is a brief mention that prosecutors are approaching three New York-based Epstein victims on the upcoming Tuesday, indicating active victim outreach in the investigation.

persons.name: Laura Grossfield Birger
persons.context: She is the sender of the initial reminder email requesting weekly reports from her team at the U.S. Attorney's Office, SDNY.

events.title: Approaching NY Epstein Victims
events.description: Prosecutors from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York plan to approach three victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York.

keyFacts: The email is dated June 7, 2019, from within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Laura Grossfield Birger is identified as the Chief of the Criminal Division.
The substantive update states that the office is 'approaching 3 NY Epstein victims on Tuesday' (June 11, 2019).
The document shows internal coordination and victim outreach efforts by SDNY prosecutors in the Epstein investigation.
The email chain is labeled as 'Weekly Updates,' indicating routine reporting within the office.
